summary:
A spirit companion for your adventures.  
Each will give you a different Blessing.
descriptionHtml:
A spirit companion for your adventures.  
Each will give you a different Blessing.    
New Location: Spirit House; Located between Helgen and Riverwood.  

Hearthfire: Some can even become your Steward.  

Details: Followers that give you Blessings and Quests.  

Fox Spirit: Huli jing
Location: Riverwood, Sleeping Giant Inn
Blessings: Blessing of Nocturnal; You are 10% harder to detect.
Perks: Light Foot, Stealth 
Carry Weight: 2000 
Quests: Bounty Quests
Essential: Cannot die.     

Bear Spirit:  Kamui
Location: Spirit House, between Helgen and Riverwood
Blessings: Blessing of Arkay; Increases your health by 25 points.
Perks: Light Foot 
Carry Weight: 2000 
Quests: Pending  
Essential: Cannot die.     

Lion Spirit:  Shisa
Location: Spirit House, between Helgen and Riverwood
Blessings: Blessing of Talos; Time between shouts is reduced 20%.
Perks: Light Foot, Stealth
Carry Weight: 2000 
Quests: Pending  
Essential: Cannot die.     

Deer Spirit:  Kasuga
Location: Spirit House, between Helgen and Riverwood
Blessings: Blessing of Akatosh; Magicka regenerates 10% faster.
Perks: Light Foot, Stealth
Carry Weight: 2000 
Quests: Pending  
Essential: Cannot die.     

Rooster Spirit:  Suzaku
Location: Spirit House, between Helgen and Riverwood
Blessings: Blessing of Stendarr; Block 10% more damage with your shield.
Perks: Light Foot, Stealth
Carry Weight: 2000 
Quests: Pending  
Essential: Cannot die.     

Rabbit Spirit: Shikoo
Location: Spirit House, between Helgen and Riverwood
Blessings: Blessing of Julianos; Increases your Magicka by 25 points.
Perks: Light Foot, Stealth 
Carry Weight: 2000 
Quests: Pending
Essential: Cannot die.     

Rat Spirit: Otoyo-Jinja
Location: Spirit House, between Helgen and Riverwood
Blessings: Blessing of Zenithar; Prices are 10% better.
Perks: Light Foot, Stealth 
Carry Weight: 2000 
Quests: Pending
Essential: Cannot die.     

Wolf Spirit: Okuri-inu 
Location: Spirit House, between Helgen and Riverwood
Blessings: Blessing of Kynareth; Increases your stamina by 25 points.  
Perks: Light Foot, Stealth 
Carry Weight: 2000 
Quests: Pending
Essential: Cannot die.     

Fawn Spirit: Reiki  
Location: Spirit House, between Helgen and Riverwood
Blessings: Blessing of Mara; Healing spells restore 10% more.
Perks: Light Foot, Stealth 
Carry Weight: 2000 
Quests: Pending
Essential: Cannot die.     

Goat Spirit: Kamoshika  
Location: Spirit House, between Helgen and Riverwood
Blessings: Blessing of Dibella; +10 Speechcraft.
Perks: Light Foot, Stealth 
Carry Weight: 2000 
Quests: Pending
Essential: Cannot die.     

Future updates:
Now that all the animals are in place I will add quests to each one.  Like Training and other Radiant quests.  This will take longer due to the testing needed. 
Please report any bugs that may occur.    

Warning: 

The pets do NOT have a set home location. When you tell them to leave they will stay at that spot. It allows you to put them in your homes or wherever you want. Just remember where you left them! 

Mods alter the game, (by design).

If you uninstall a mod without dismissing the follower from that mod the game will still think you have a follower and you will be unable to hire another. 

It is a good practice to make a save before trying new mods and/or save without any of the mod components attached to your character, i.e. Followers, Armor, Zones, Quests, Spells. 

Command Console: Dismiss Follower (set playerfollowercount to 0)

Change Log: 
11/17/12: 1.0.0; Initial release.
11/23/12: 1.1.0; Added Spirit House. Two new followers. Added Blessings to Spirit Followers.  
11/24/12: 1.1.1; Added two new followers. Tweeked Spirit follower stats for survivability. Tweeked Spirit House entrance.  
11/25/12: 1.1.2; Added two new followers.
11/28/12: 1.1.3; Added the final three followers.  Reduced the breath sound of the Fox Spirit.  Adjusted Spirit House entrance.
author: BobitoZ
